meanings.definition: A person or thing that defines.
meanings.sent1: The definers of the rules made sure everyone followed them.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was the main definer of the classroom expectations.
meanings.sent3: The definers of the game decided to change the rules halfway through.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, the brush is a powerful definer of the final masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The definer of the puzzle was the key to solving it.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for defining.
meanings.sent1: The students used a dictionary as a definer to look up new words.
meanings.sent2: The compass was an essential definer for drawing precise circles.
meanings.sent3: The definer, a ruler, helped create straight lines on the paper.
meanings.sent4: In cooking, a knife is a definer for cutting ingredients with precision.
meanings.sent5: The definer, a magnifying glass, helped identify tiny details in the picture.

meanings.definition: A group of people who establish or determine something.
meanings.sent1: The definers of the project set clear goals for everyone to achieve.
meanings.sent2: The committee acted as the definer of the new company policies.
meanings.sent3: The definers of the event decided on the theme and decorations.
meanings.sent4: In history, leaders have been the definers of the fate of nations.
meanings.sent5: The definers of fashion trends influence what people wear.
